leadership

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labor.
  • harry whitcombe
    chief executive
    hugh is a chartered engineer with over 30 years’ experience of industrial operations and commercial management. he has worked across a range of sectors, including power generation, petrochemicals and general manufacturing and engineering, specialising in operational turnaround and performance improvement.
  • larry howard
    investment director
    larry has more than two decades of experience in the retail and consumer goods sectors, having previously acted as head of finance for dunnes stores in dublin, ireland. he also has extensive experience in working with troubled and stressed businesses across a number of sectors.
  • ben edwardse
    investment director
    ben is an experienced multi-discipline engineer, specialising in precision engineering. with sector experience of over 15 years including senior management roles, supporting both simple and complex transitions. ben operates as the main coordinator for the engineering and industrial assets within the amcomri group.
  • mark o’neill
    investment director
    Mark is a Chartered Accountant with over 12 years' experience in corporate finance and restructuring transactions. Prior to joining Amcomri, Mark worked at Deloitte and managed a number of investments for Hilco Capital
